game.name: Mosaic
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 전적으로 초현실적인, 이상하게 낯이 익은 세상에 발을 들어 보세요. 머릿속에 각인될만한 경험을 통해 일상적인 존재의 흐름을 벗어나 보세요. Mosaic는 2~3시간 정도 이어지는 강렬한 스토리의 모던 어드벤처 게임입니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Enter a world that’s utterly surreal and eerily familiar. Escape the mundanity of your existence in an experience that will stay with you. Mosaic is a narrative-driven modern adventure game with a story that lasts about 2-3 hours.

reviewHighlights.text: Mostly a linear walking simulator with no narration, some interactions and no puzzles, except the actual "work" at the company that will repeat 4 or 5...
